title: Makus
author: Makus
content: Good day my fellow bitcoiners, all protocols observed. This few days I don do some series of transaction wey make me come dey wonder weda na all segwit wallet naim dey collect high fees for transaction abi na just the one wey I dey use, because na electrum wallet naim I use and the kind of transaction fee wey those people dey take charge my transaction nor dey nice at all, dem dey collect like 10% of the money wey I wan transact and this kind of thing dey short my money well well, naim make I say make I bring this problem come board weda my boss dem fit give me recommendations or direct me to any wallet wey nor dey too take much for transaction fee.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: As e be so, I already believe say you dey aware say electrum wallet no be exchange wallet, the electrum wallet nah for when you hold your coin for dear life nai you supposed to dey use am but for person like you way dey sell coins most times, I go like tell you to use an exchange wallet instead of the electrum wallet because exchange wallet go reduce the stress of high fee and waist of time for you.Well, make you try binance exchange wallet, that nah another good exchange wallet for those way really dey sell their coins all the time, me I dey use electrum wallet before but letter on I con change am because of fees and waist of time and since then I dey get no stress (but I still dey use am)... Watin I dey try make you understand be say the electrum wallet no dey bad ohh, e dey more safer than the exchange wallet like binance and all the rest.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: My brother na so e be for everywhere na normal thing wey be say fees they high this period. The amount of transaction wey go they included for every block done they constrained, or ah go call am congested for the BTC blockchain. This thing done limit am to 7 transactions per second. Which we know say e they very slow generally.  Anytime wey be say person send transaction for the blockchain, nah in tow parts, one for Bitcoin and the second one nah for miners to carry pay as they dey process the transaction wey they dey also use they carry maintain the network. The amount wey be say fees they cost dey change from time to time e no they static at all. If so, many persons they try make transaction at the same time only those wey pay higher for the fees own nah him they go release fast why those wey set the fees to they low go wait till their own come. Sometimes e fit even take one full day before u go receive am sef.

comments.body: I no sure say the fee suppose reach that 10% electrum nah good wallet, and then get better features so if you see default fee like that Watin u suppose do nah to use the custom fee settings then reduce the fee to how eh go suit you for body, money no too they to come waste am give people way already don get the money. No be only your wallet fee high like that nah so the blockchain bee the network they congested and fee high for everybody, so if you send your transaction with fee way at least reach $1-$2 eh fit take time but eh go go and if nah just one address you they send am go, after you don send the transaction out you fit use accelerator as one of our own person been share for the local board carry accelerate the transaction to make am faster. comments.body: Quote from: Makus on November 14, 2023, 04:08:30 PMGood day my fellow bitcoiners, all protocols observed. The memepool is currently congested because of the number of transactions going on it, this has caused transactions fee to increase rapidly. it is as a result of the bitcoin scalability issue and not the wallet.It's at least  better now compared to last week. the SEGWIT address is still the cheapest of all Bitcoin address and the fees are allocated by the miners not the wallet so don't get it wrong.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Mempool is congested. That is the reason for the high fee needed for making transaction for now. Use ViaBTC free accelerator which is helpful. But make sure that the transaction fee is not less than 10 sat/byte (let it be around 19 sat/vbyte if you are using native segwit address).Make sure that the size of the transaction is not more than 500 bytes.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: OP, I go recommend say make you no too dey make transactions in times when transaction fees dey high like now. If the transaction no dey absolutely necessary, just keep am and wait for better time when the mempool no dey congested. A quick look at mempool.space go tell you say e get some times wey the mempool dey hit peak capacity to indicate say demand for transaction confirmation dey high and plenty people dey replace old fee with new fee just to make their own transactions to be confirmed before other people own.If you no fit wait, just follow that Charles-Tim thread on viaBTC usage. I don use am in the past and it was okay.  But remember say no guarantee say e go actually get your transaction 10x faster.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: nelson4lov on November 14, 2023, 06:24:10 PMIf you no fit wait, just follow that Charles-Tim thread on viaBTC usage. I don use am in the past and it was okay.  But remember say no guarantee say e go actually get your transaction 10x faster. If the transaction is successfully submitted, and ViaBTC then mine a block, the transaction will be included into the block and which means the transaction will be confirmed. it may take like two or three hours before ViaBTC may mine a block based on the hash rate the mining pool is generating.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: The mempool dey congested right now but wetin I dey observe be say in every 24hr, the congestion dey reduce small, so if you broadcast a transaction, just dey patient small except you dey in a haste to use the funds. If you fit try set your fee at 30 - 50 sat/vb, I dey sure say a miner go pick am, but if you dey desperate you fit bump am or use fee accelerator. Yesterday, I been get one incoming transaction wey the fee dey set at 39 sat/vb wey come stuck for mempool for about 3hrs, then high priority na 72 sat/vb. I try the ViaBTC free accelerator but dem no gree include my transaction for their mining block because the block size been exceed 500kb. And me self no dey ready to bump the transaction. Naso I leave am, in 4 hrs time, a miner been come pick the transaction.
